function.name: browser
function.description: Interact with the browser using Playwright

text.description: Text to type or key to press

start_x.description: Start X coordinate for drag actions

start_y.description: Start Y coordinate for drag actions

duration.description: Duration in seconds for hold_key or wait actions

function.name: complete_task
function.description: Signal that the task has been completed successfully. Use this when you have finished the assigned task. If the task requires you to submit an answer, you can do so here.

success.description: Whether the task was completed successfully

summary.description: A brief summary of what was accomplished

answer.description: Optional: The specific answer to the question/task if applicable (e.g., for Q&A tasks, data extraction, counting tasks, etc.)

function.name: give_up
function.description: LAST RESORT ONLY: Give up on the task when you have absolutely no other alternatives. This should ONLY be used when: 1) You have exhausted all possible approaches, 2) The task appears impossible due to technical limitations, 3) You are stuck in an unrecoverable state. DO NOT use this tool if you could try different approaches, wait longer, or attempt alternative solutions. This is a failure state - use it sparingly.

reason.description: Detailed explanation of why you are giving up and what you have already tried

attempts_made.description: List of specific approaches and solutions you have already attempted
